survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Parking Payment Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their experience with contactless parking payment solutions to improve service quality and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless payment methods for parking?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly design for ease of selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless payment methods for parking?

questions.question_text: Which contactless payment methods have you used for parking? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mobile payment apps (e.g., Apple Pay, Google Pay)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which contactless payment methods have you used for parking? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mobile payment apps (e.g., Apple Pay, Google Pay)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using contactless parking payment solutions?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using contactless parking payment solutions?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using contactless parking payment solutions?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using contactless parking payment solutions?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see improved or added to contactless parking payment solutions?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement. Encourage detailed responses.
